result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Nathan Ramirez

records.addlTxt: Status conference on December 12, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
At the request of Attorney Moore the STC of 10/31/22 at 3:00 has been reset to 12/12/22 at 1:30 due to Attorney Moore's unavailability.

NO RECORD MADE. Attorney Daniel Alejandro Bernard Deida in court for State of Wisconsin. Attorney Adrienne Michelle Moore in court for Nathan Ramirez. Defendant Nathan Ramirez appeared by video, in custody. Clerk. M.Burke. Attorney Moore states that the State is looking into other charges.
Status conference scheduled for October 31, 2022 at 03:00 pm.
The JPTC of 08/23/22 at 8:30 has been adjourned with Attorney Moore to 09/21/22 at 9:30.

Defendant Nathan Ramirez appeared with Attorney Adrienne Michelle Moore.  Defendant in custody. Attorney Daniel Alejandro Bernard Deida appeared for the Prosecution.  Clerk JT  Minutes:  DE waives preliminary hearing; probable cause found.  Bound over.   Information filed; reading waived.  Not guilty plea entered. Scheduling Order given to Attorney in court. DE motion to modify bond; arguments heard; Court denies motion.   Bond continued.  Judicial Pretrial - in court scheduled for August 23, 2022 at 08:30 am.
for Bond Review and Modification of Bond.

Defendant Nathan Ramirez in court, in custody.  Attorney Daniel Alejandro Bernard Deida appeared for the Prosecution.  Clerk JT  Minutes:  Atty Moore is unavailable this morning.    DE waives time for preliminary hearing.  Bond continued.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for August 16, 2022 at 08:30 am.

120PM   Assistant District Attorney Brenda Valdes appeared for the State.  Defendant in custody and appeared by Zoom w/ Attorney Adrienne Moore.  Clerk JT  Minutes:  Preliminary Hearing set on July 22, 2022 at 09:00 am before Comm , 927-54th Street, Room 157, Kenosha, WI.  Bond continued.  sg

  Attorney Thomas Binger appeared for the State.  Defendant appeared in custody.  Clerk JT  Minutes:  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for June 15, 2022 at 01:00 pm.  Atty Status.  Bond is continued as previously set.    jk

Defendant Nathan Ramirez in court, in custody.  Attorney Alexander Huber appeared for the Prosecution.  Clerk JT  Minutes:  SPD has been unable to appoint an attorney for DE for today's hearing. Court holds colloquy with DE re: proceeding pro se or waiving time to allow SPD to appoint an attorney.  DE waives time for preliminary hearing. Court reschedules preliminary hearing to an attorney status hearing.  Bond continued.  Status conference scheduled for May 10, 2022 at 01:00 pm.
Deft is eligible for SPD services, however, no atty has agree to represent this applicant.
